title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.2 - Steps when a youth is considered awol
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.2 - Steps when a youth is considered awol

State Regulations

Facility personnel should take the following steps: (a) search the facility grounds and the
surrounding community immediately; and
(b) notify the police, youth service team
worker, and youth' s parents within four hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
181.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
